env_setup:
Initial clean-up
Execute rm -r ~/Desktop/oi/* to start with fresh test directory.
mkdir -p ~/Desktop/oi/archive/old_project
prompt: I have an empty folder at archive/old_project that I don't need anymore. Can you delete it?
expected_behaviour: The agent should verify that ~/Desktop/oi/archive/old_project is empty, delete it using an appropriate command (like `rmdir ~/Desktop/oi/archive/old_project`), and confirm the successful removal to the user. Achieving a similar outcome using any reasonable method is perfectly acceptable.
